scenario_text.value:
We don’t know how long we’ll be here. We’ll
need food and water, so let’s look around.
I’ve got to agree with Aoi on this one.

Well, Aoi is Aoi, after all.
Good choice, Takuma.
Well, I thought your opinion was right.

Thanks anyway, Takuma.
And thank you too, Agumon.

So, we’re searching the school then?
I’ll help.

Right. I’ll look for some food. Let me
know if you find something, Takuma.

We have to come to a decision on this,
together. I want to hear from everyone.
Well, think about it some more.
